Thulsa's legion scourged this valley when they invaded. The few survivors told tales about {@LinkCreature:27#16#Calapana}, one of the legion's leaders.

I want you to slay Calapana, as brutally as possible. I want to demoralize and confuse the enemy, that'll give us a better shot of making a breakthrough.

Presumably, she did not die well? Excellent.

Never underestimate your foes, , and respect those worthy of it. Butchering civilians, however, never merits respect, much less an honorable death. Carry on.
